attributes.action: help all low income familes out of fuel poverty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: mr brown we need the extension of winter fuel allowance for all low income families and the disabled not just the deserved pensioners. many need financial help immediately, not just energy saving measures

rejection.details:
This petiton overlaps with several already in existence: 

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Carers-Payments/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
